'''Down to Dodge''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Domains and Spiral Abyss: Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by completing various chambers of the [[Spiral Abyss]] without taking damage.

==Achievements==
{{Achievements by Category Table|Down to Dodge}}

==Gameplay Notes==
*Damage absorbed by [[shield]]s or [[HP Loss#Talents|HP Loss]] caused by talents does not count as taking damage.
*It is possible to earn the Tier 2 and Tier 3 achievements first. However, the player will be unable to claim the rewards before completing the preceding achievements.

==Trivia==
* The Chinese name {{zh|来自深境|rm=láizìshēnjìng|tl=''From the Depths''}} is likely a parody of Japanese manga {{zh|来自深渊|rm=láizìshēnyuān|tl=''{{w|Made in Abyss}}''}}.
* The Korean name {{ko|비경에서 온 그대}} is a parody of {{ko|별에서 온 그대|rm=Byeoreseo On Geudae|tl=''{{w|My Love From the Star}}'',}} which was a popular Korean Drama in 2013–2014.
